description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-43543):

1. Identify your specific Windows version and build number from the details below.
2. Download and install the relevant KB article update from the Microsoft Update Catalog using the provided links.
3. Restart your system to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5044273
- Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5044273
- Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5044280
- Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5044285
- Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5044284
- Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems: KB5044284
- For manual installation, follow the links:
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that you check and match the update based on the Windows version and build you are running.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
